page.title: 05Lavington School.
page.content: There are 553 pupils.They are arranged in 30 classrooms with 54 teaching staff.They teach 30 subjects.One of which is farming.The farm was built before the school and it is used as an educational resource.They have 4 cows, 4 sows and 30 piglets.At present{Mr. {David Bury }is Headmaster.He has been Headmaster for 4 years.The number of O level passes at grades A,B,C in 1984 was 194.There were 32 passes at grade 1 CSE.94 pupils were in the 5th and 6th years.We asked a pupil{Nicola {Hibberd,}what she thought of the school.She said it gave a wide range of subjects,with a teacher for each. The forms are large at first but get smaller as you get older.Her favourite subjects are art,sport and games.She thinks school uniform is suitable for girls.
